description: The as*hole cheated on her. Gu Shuangshuang ended the relationship and came across another man. What the hell was up with this guy??? One day, the man presented the red registration book with her name on it, saying: “ Why don’t you call me daddy sweetheart?!” So, could she truly call him and his hot dick daddy? Gu Shuangshuang’s finally got enlightened:” Daddy~ You baddy~ help! If you know what I mean~”>
